name: You Will Die (Declivever)
description:
My first attempt at a multi-tier boss fight. Collect the orbs, and avoid the lasers, floor spikes, and falling rocks. In general red is bad, avoid red. 

See how long you can last! The game ends at 200 points. Should only take a few minutes to beat.

Note: You may want to lower your volume. I have lowered it as much as I can, but I don't wanna shatter any ear drums.

Assets Used:

Music
8-Bit Mega Action Platformer Soundtrack

Sound Effects
Groovys 50 Retro Sound Effects Package

Art
Myself

Made for the VimJam2.
